response.job_title: Data Scientist | Information Specialist at CSG Forte
response.summary:
Data Scientist with fluency in Statistics and Machine Learning algorithms. Working experience developing
business impact projects. Besides, I have ability to explain complex ideas in a simple way. Moreover, I am passionate about challenges, especially if they involve innovation, creativity, and working with people from different cultures and points of view.
response.skills: Microsoft Power Platform, Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft PowerApps, Bases de datos, Capacidad de análisis, Ciencia de datos, Algoritmos de aprendizaje automático, Simulación de Monte Carlo, Analítica de datos, Python, KNIME, Estadística, Aprendizaje supervisado, Aprendizaje automático, Visualización de datos, Team Leadership, Data Analysis, Statistical Data Analysis, Teamwork, Storytelling

profile_positions.description:
Application of Machine Learning Predictive and Classification Models, Mathematic Algorithms and Statistical Analysis aiming to detect potential frauds and decrease the Information Security risks. Design of Power BI Dashboards.

Achievements:
- Developing of succesfull Fraud Prediction Models.
- Design of analytics apps for risk management.
profile_positions.title: Analytics and Risk Monitoring Analyst

profile_positions.description:
As member of Managed Services team, I had the responsibility of maintain the Data Integrity as well as Software Configuration Items in operations for Billing Software Services. 
ACHIEVEMENTS:
- 52% reduction in Billing Operations time. Going from 3 to 1.4 hours implementing automations with Python.
- Decreasing of human errors by 100% in fulfillment reporting, implementing a VBA script in Excel.
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Analyst

profile_positions.description:
In my internship, I had the opportunity to work in three core areas of the company, leading high impact projects in each one of them.

ACHIEVEMENTS:
- 95% reduction in handling time of databases. Going from 8 hours to 25 minutes by campaign.
- Increase of roughly 724.896 units in annual fragrance production.
profile_positions.title: Trainee

profile_positions.description:
As assistant student, I earned the trust of my bosses due to my high level of responsibility. My duties included tasks as:
- Attending ideation meetings, researching and project formulation.
- Assisting core processes related to the management of different dependencies.
profile_positions.title: Student Assistant

company.name: CSG Forte
company.description:
At CSG Forte, we help our customers grow their businesses quickly and scale payments smarter with a unified payments platform. Our platform seamlessly adapts to meet your evolving needs, while reducing complexity and cutting costs. With our experience, world-class technology and vast ecosystem of partners, we have the solutions and skills to grow alongside your business. 

A little bit more about us:
-	20+ years of experience
-	81,000+ merchants supported across the U.S.
-	$84 billion in payments processed annually
-	173 million transactions processed annually

At CSG Forte, we work better together. Thousands of government, telecom, insurance and other industry merchants trust CSG Forte as their digital payments solution provider of choice, including Charter Communications, DISH, Gexa Energy, Kinston North Carolina and SedonaOffice.

Our award-winning, Nacha-preferred payments solution allows companies to process omnichannel payments and offer agnostic payment acceptance, online, in person and over the phone. And we continue to raise the bar— among our 2022 wins, CSG Forte was ranked Best Performing Gateway as well as Best of Breed API by The Strawhecker Group.

From small and medium-sized businesses, to integrated software vendors (ISVs) and Fortune 500 enterprises, we have the experience and solutions to fit your needs to process payments faster, smarter and at scale.
